name: lecmi

stmt.origin: sylibr(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))

stmt.origin: ssinss1(c0, c1, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))
-| wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, ccm, c1), wss(cin(c0, co(cfv(cort, c0), chj, c1)), c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, c1), wbr(c0, ccm, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆ c1 → c0[C_H]c1)
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

comment: Comparable Hilbert lattice elements commute. Theorem 2.3(iii) of [Beran] p. 40. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jan-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.)
